original_text:
The heavens are the Lord's heavens,
    but the earth he has given to the children of man.
korean_text: 하늘은 여호와의 하늘이라도 땅은 사람에게 주셨도다

sentences.original_text: The heavens are the Lord's heavens
but the earth he has given to the children of man.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 땅은 사람의 아들들에게 주셨습니다.
